channel.title: ramblings on Eruhinim
channel.description: Recent content in ramblings on Eruhinim

item.title: Lte Dongle Update
item.description: Well that post simply exploded! Never thought so many people would be interested in this topic. The thread is a treasure trove for mobile communications knowledge. Check it out. In other news ordered an Alcatel with “official Linux support”. Let’s see what comes out of it. Updates to come soon.

item.title: Lte Dongle
item.description: Yesterday I asked about open hardware platforms/products for modems that can connect to 3G/4G netwroks in a dongle format. And what do you know, basically nothing came up hardware-wise. Apparently BIG CORP & CO.â„¢ has an extremely tight grip on the entire affair and everything is riddled with patents and license fees. This saddens me a little since it could’ve helped with an upcoming project, but alas I’ll have to do with one of the ordinary modems on the market right now.

item.title: Never Ending Job Interviews
item.description: The other day in HN land this one took off as a fire storm: The rise of never-ending job interviews (bbc.com) 899 points by hhs 1 day ago | flag | hide | past | favorite | 1107 comments Quite unsurprising to be honest. Many people have been hurt by the unending complexity and choose-your-own-adventure process that is hiring. And I don’t see it changing any time soon. For one software ate the world, but not everything in the world is so great to be eaten.
